about_the_game:
"Shadowfall" is an epic action-adventure RPG set in a fantastical world of magic and myth. You take on the role of Kael, a young hero tasked with saving the kingdom of Arvandor from a looming darkness that threatens to destroy everything in its path.

Embark on a thrilling journey across Arvandor's many lands, from the enchanted Whispering Woods to the treacherous Shimmering Desert, in search of powerful artifacts that will aid you in your quest. Battle fierce monsters, explore vast dungeons, and engage in exciting combat against enemy forces as you seek to uncover the truth behind the looming darkness.

With 20 unique character classes to choose from, each with their own strengths and weaknesses, the possibilities for customization and strategy are endless. From the agile assassin to the mighty spellblade, every character class offers a unique playstyle and set of skills.

Shadowfall features immersive storytelling, stunning graphics, and a dynamic soundtrack that will keep you engaged from start to finish. Whether you're a seasoned RPG player or new to the genre, this game offers a truly unforgettable experience that will keep you coming back for more.

Characters


Kael Easton



Kael was born into the royal family of Arvandor as the only child of the king and queen. From a young age, Kael showed a strong interest in combat, and was determined to become a skilled warrior. However, his parents were wary of indulging his passion, wanting him to focus on his studies and the responsibilities of being a prince.

Galen Ravenwood



Galen was a young man from a small village who dreamed of becoming a knight. He trained in secret and eventually landed a job as a guard at the castle, where he was assigned as Kael's personal bodyguard. Over time, the two grew close, with Galen acting as a mentor and older brother figure to the prince. Galen became fiercely protective of Kael, and the two formed a bond that went beyond duty or obligation. Now, Galen is a trusted member of Kael's inner circle, and the two share a deep friendship.

Elara Wildwood



Elara was born under the sheltering canopy of a mystical forest, imbued with the wild's untamed spirit. Her parents, wandering herbalists, instilled in her an appreciation for the natural world and its creatures from a tender age.

As a child, she found companionship in forest animals, discovering a unique ability to understand their needs and feelings. Her kinship with the woodland creatures was natural, and they, in turn, were drawn to the harmony.

Features

  • 20 playable character
  • Item crafting system
  • Paradox turn based battle system
  • Immense storyline
  • 3 Alternate endings
  • Karma system
